com.xxu.database

Class TokenDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xxu.database.PostgreSql
      • com.xxu.database.TokenDatabase

  • public class TokenDatabase
extends PostgreSql
    Author:
    xxu class for getting token of user by id from database. The token may expired in a certain time
